Package se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.auth.impl

Class DefaultCMCValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.auth.impl.AbstractCMCValidator
      • se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.auth.impl.DefaultCMCValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CMCValidator
    public class DefaultCMCValidator
extends AbstractCMCValidator
    Provides a default CMC validator that validates the CMC signature based on a set of trusted certificates. This validator requires the CMC to be signed by a single certificate.
    Author:
    Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)
